actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

official_title: To establish a program of grants for supplemental assistance for elementary and secondary school students of limited English proficiency to ensure that they rapidly develop proficiency in English while not falling behind in their academic studies.
short_title: Kids Developing Skills for Success in the 21st Century Act

summary.text: Kids Developing Skills for Success in the 21st Century Act - Directs the Secretary of Education to allot grants to State educational agencies to assist local educational agencies in providing supplemental assistance for elementary and secondary school students of limited English proficiency.

titles.title: Kids Developing Skills for Success in the 21st Century Act

To establish a program of grants for supplemental assistance for elementary and secondary school students of limited English proficiency to ensure that they rapidly develop proficiency in English while not falling behind in their academic studies.
